io.sarl.maven.docs

Class AbstractDocumentationMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • io.sarl.maven.docs.AbstractDocumentationMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    public abstract class AbstractDocumentationMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
    Abstract Maven MOJO for the documentation of the SARL project.
    Since:
    0.6
    Version:
    io.sarl.maven.docs.generator 0.12.0 20210527-171007
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.sarl.maven
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.sarl.maven.docs.generator

    • Method Detail

      • getSkippingMessage

        protected abstract def getSkippingMessage() : String 
        Description copied from class: AbstractDocumentationMojo
        Replies the message to display for skipping the execution of this mojo. If this function does not reply a message, the execution is not skipped. If this function replies a message, the execution is skipped.
        Returns:
        A message for skipping the execution, or null for executing the mojo.

      • internalExecute

        protected def internalExecute(sourceFolder : File,
                              inputFile : File,
                              relativeInputFile : File,
                              outputFolder : File,
                              parser : AbstractMarkerLanguageParser) : void 
                       throws IOException
        Description copied from class: AbstractDocumentationMojo
        Execute the mojo on the given set of files.
        Parameters:
        sourceFolder - the source folder.
        inputFile - the input file.
        relativeInputFile - the name of the input file relatively to the source folder.
        outputFolder - the output folder.
        parser - the parser to be used for reading the input file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is some issue with IO.
        UnsupportedOperationException - a runtime exception.
